tool_description: Document Generation API that uses OpenAI to create an example resume when provided the following data: University Name, Degree, and a list of Skills
title: AI Resume Generator

api_list.name: Generate Document: Cover Letter
api_list.description: Endpoint that will generate a large text response containing a Cover Letter document using the provided information

parameters.name: jobDescription
parameters.default: Example Co. is looking for a Full Stack Web Developer to maintain and improve our custom web application. The solutions will require both frontend and backend skills. Our web application runs on a LEMP stack. LEMP stack experience is a bonus, but not required.

utterances.utterance: Generate a cover letter for a Full Stack Web Developer position at Example Co. with a degree in Information Systems from Michigan State University and skills in Networking and Web Development.

api_list.name: Generate Document: Resume
api_list.description: Endpoint that will generate a large text response containing a Resume document using the provided information

utterances.utterance: Generate a resume for someone with a degree in Computer Science from Stanford University and skills in Python and Machine Learning.
Create a resume for a graduate in Business Administration from Harvard University with skills in Marketing and Finance.
Generate a resume for a person with a degree in Electrical Engineering from MIT and skills in Circuit Design and Embedded Systems.
Create a resume for someone with a degree in Psychology from UCLA and skills in Counseling and Behavioral Analysis.
Generate a resume for a graduate in Mechanical Engineering from Georgia Tech with skills in CAD and Thermodynamics.
Create a resume for someone with a degree in Biology from University of California, Berkeley and skills in Genetics and Molecular Biology.
Generate a resume for a person with a degree in Chemistry from University of Chicago and skills in Organic Chemistry and Analytical Chemistry.
Create a resume for someone with a degree in Mathematics from Princeton University and skills in Statistics and Data Analysis.
Generate a resume for a graduate in Economics from University of Pennsylvania with skills in Econometrics and Financial Modeling.
Create a resume for someone with a degree in English Literature from Yale University and skills in Creative Writing and Editing.
